info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued July 30 at 6:05PM PDT until July 30 at 8:00PM PDT by NWS Reno NV
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Reno has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Central Pershing County in west central Nevada...
* Until 800 PM PDT.
* At 605 PM PDT, a wall of dust was along a line extending from 19 miles north of Trinity Junction to near Lovelock to near Oreana to 18 miles south of Unionville, moving north at 15 mph.
HAZARD...Near zero visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph.
SOURCE...Doppler radar.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* INTERSTATE 80 BETWEEN LOVELOCK AND IMLAY.
Locations impacted include... Lovelock, Oreana, Imlay, Unionville, Junction I 80 And Nv 396/857 (exit 112), Seven Troughs Mountain, Rye Patch Reservoir, Star Peak, Trinity Peak, Majuba Mountain, Mill City, McKinney Pass, Rye Patch Reservoir Campground, Toulon Peak, Organ Peak, and Buffalo Mountain.
info.instruction: DUST STORMS ARE DEADLY. Zero visibility. If caught in dust, pull off the road and turn off all lights. Delay travel if at all possible.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 8:00 PM PDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 8:00 PM PDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 8:00 PM PDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 8:00 PM PDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.
